text:
Local Government (Highways) Amendment Order 1995

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 23(2) of the Local Government (Highways) Act 1982 .

3 March 1995

P. H. BENNETT

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

JOHN BESWICK

for and on behalf of the Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government (Highways) Amendment Order 1995 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Local Government (Highways) Order 1994 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government (Highways) Order 1994 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 8 March 1995

This order is administered in the Department of Environment and Land Management.
